Description:
DOUBLE STOREY GLORY!
Looking for a spacious quality-built home? Look no further!! Located opposite a lovely park, not too far from shopping centers and schools, close to a train station and freeway is this double-storey home built in 2017. As you enter this elegant home you will find a formal living area overlooking a beautiful park, the entry leads to a large family living area with a well-appointed kitchen that features stone bench tops, walk in pantry with power points, a 900mm Technica cooking appliance and a Bosch dishwasher. The kitchen adjoins a dining area which flows out to the undercover alfresco, all this makes for an exciting entertainment area. Upstairs is a world of its own, an enormous master suite with private balcony where you can sit with your favorite drink while watching the sunset over the park or enjoy time out in the parents retreat. Ad to this a large ensuite with double basins and stone bench tops, double shower and a separate toilet, a spacious walk in robe, you have the best of the best. A fourth living area/rumpus room and a study nook makes that there is something for everyone. Another three large bedrooms, main bathroom with bath and shower and a third toilet finishes of upstairs.
Double powder coated metal feature gates lead to the rear of the property allowing access for boat, trailer or caravan etc. The back yard is a blank canvas for you to add your own touch.
Features of the home include and are not limited to:
• Downstairs powder room
• Study nook, loads of storage
• Solar hot water system with booster upgraded storage capacity
• Solar panels 6Kwt 19 panels
• Ducted heating
• Evaporated cooling
• Wall mounted cooling
• Blinds in all bedrooms
• Split system in bedroom
• Double garage with external rear door and internal door
• 512sqm block
Currently tenanted till September 2020, at this point and time tenants would be keen to extend their lease.

Description:
COMMERCIAL & HIGH DENSITY RESIDENTIAL SITE
Ray White Pakenham is proud to present 9103m2 (approx) of prime opportunity for those with some vision!
The site backs on to "local open space" as earmarked by council, and also the huge Officer Town Centre development located a few doors to the right.
No doubt the location of this property is gold, but also the Officer suburb has shown consistently to be one of the fastest growing suburbs in Australia!
Within 1km:
- 5 schools, consisting of public and private, primary and secondary.
- Childcare centre almost adjacent to the property
- New commercial development across the road
- Officer Train Station - 5 Minute Walk.
- 926 Bus (Pakenham - Fountain Gate)
This property is For Sale by Expressions of Interest.
Call Mandeep on 0433 591 561 for any enquiries. I'm available 24/7, so there's no excuses if you miss out on this opportunity of a lifetime!

Description:
OVER 30 SQUARES OF GRANDEUR LIVING
Situated in a quiet court location and on a 512m2 (approx) block of land and in the Arena Estate lies this outstanding family home built by award winning Metricon homes. Entering the estate you are greeted with established tree lined streets and lifes amenities just minutes away including public transport, Arena shopping hub, prestigious schools, sporting facilities and an array of park lands and walking tracks.
Providing a statement from the outset is the striking brick veneer façade surrounded by beautiful manicured gardens. As you enter the residence you will be impressed with the classy timber laminate flooring, wide entrance hall and high ceilings.
Down the hall flows onto the heart of the home including open plan gourmet kitchen with 900mm oven, stone benchtops, walk in pantry and an abundance of storage space, all overlooking the main living and dining zone. Adjoining from this zone is a second large formal lounge, giving plenty of space for the whole family.
The large master bedroom includes WIR and full ensuite with shower, double vanity and separate toilet. All additional bedrooms are conventionally located in a separate wing and are serviced by the main bathroom which has been finished with high quality fixtures and fittings.
Outdoors is an entertainers paradise with sliding doors leading out to decked undercover alfresco which includes speaker system all situated amongst landscaped gardens and a great sized backyard.
Added features of the home include remote controlled double garage, split system cooling/heating, ducted heating, large laundry, quality blinds throughout and much more.
Properties rarely come up for sale in the Arena Estate. This is an opportunity to secure a unbeatable family home in a premier location.

Description:
Position is the Prize !
This massive 1,176m2 allotment zoned: Urban Growth Zone Schedule 4 is located within the proposed Officer Town Centre under the Officer Precinct Structure Plan September 2011 (Amended November 2019) Officer Town Centre. Those with an eye to the future will see the huge potential afforded by this blue chip opportunity.
Protecting your investment with a reliable income stream is is a two bedroom, one bathroom timber home with a large open plan living area incorporating a timber kitchen. A broad, timber decked and covered verandah completes the residence. A two car carport provides car accommodation. Currently leased on a periodic tenancy to a long term reliable tenant.
Considering the relentless expansion of the Berwick to Pakenham corridor this is truly an exeptional opportunity. Inspect with absolute confidence.
INSPECTION PROCEDURE:
In light of the current COVID-19 situation, this property may be inspected by appointment. We have implemented safety procedures for the wellbeing of all. These include social distancing, use of hand sanitizers and no unnecessary hand contact with surfaces within the property. Please discuss any concerns you may have before arriving at the inspection.

Description:
Snap up a superb family entertainer!
Modern, convenient and super spacious, this beautifully-presented home is perfect for a young family. Boasting an excellent yard with a luxury spa, the entertainer of the household will be delighted.Get in quick and make this premium residence your own!
Occupying a generously-sized block on the popular Timbertop Estate -which features a lakeside café, bike tracks and peaceful parks - this is a fantastic place to settle and grow. The first thing you'll spot is this property's impressive kerbside appeal, courtesy of its contemporary façade and manicured surrounds.
As you step inside via the double-door entry, you're greeted by heaps of natural light, elegant timber flooring and a flowing floorplan that features three individual living spaces, including an open-plan family/meal area, cosy lounge with gas fire and a comfortable rumpus. There's so much space here, whether you're simply relaxing in front of the TV or dining with guests.
The stylish designer kitchen is a particular highlight and boasts sleek stone benchtops, quality 900mm appliances and a huge walk-in pantry for all your storage needs. The aspiring chef will be over the moon!
Towards the front of the home, you'll find the oversized master with its fabulous walk-in robe and exclusive en suite. Complete privacy is guaranteed with a large shower and chic double vanity. The three remaining bedrooms are all robed and share the gleaming family bathroom with separate WC.
Finishing touches include a sizeable laundry, walk-in linen closet, high ceilings, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, AC to the family area, an alarm system, security cameras and blinds throughout. You'll also benefit from a double garage and low-maintenance yard that showcases a kids' cubby house and decked alfresco with an outside fireplace and relaxing spa.
Perfectly located for a busy family, you'll enjoy close proximity to Officer Station, Beaconsfield Station, Beaconsfield Plaza, Casey Hospital, central Berwick and great local schools, including Heritage College and Haileybury. You're also just a moment from the Princes Highway for easy commuting.
This is a beautiful family home in a sought-after location. Let's talk today!
Photo I.D. required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Hip and Happening!
Walk into this glorious home and know quickly "I love it". Brilliantly designed, and with numerous clever timeless 'cool' non standard features, this is 4 bedrooms of fabulous.
Attractive facade, wander in past the beautifully equipped master with spacious ensuite and WIR. Onwards, walking upon luxurious tiles into the family room, gaze up to the raked ceiling giving one a generous sense of space.
Immaculately appointed kitchen has the ultimate sleek look, complete with stone benches, dual ovens, induction cook top and scullery.
Separate study, additional rumpus room and decked alfresco are all presentation perfect.
All the creature comforts are here, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, alarm system, inter comm, and ducted vacuum along with double garage and wonderful landscaping. Close to St Francis and many more schools and an abundance of shops and minutes from public transport. Future parks, walking tracks and more to begin shortly.
Simply nothing, for the but one lucky purchaser, to do.
Please call 0414 791 161 or 9707 4222 to arrange a private inspection.

Description:
Investors Take Note in Officer!!
Situated in Officer, this quality home is just a short walk to the Lakeside Square Shopping Precinct, schools, Cardinia Train Station and easy access to the M1 Freeway.
Offering:
* Three bedrooms, all with built in robes
* Main bathroom with shower and bath
* Open plan family/dining room
* Magnificent kitchen, featuring stone bench tops, island bench, stainless steel oven, gas cooktop, range hood & stainless steel dishwasher
* Ducted heating
* Split system
* Double garage with remote control
* Generous backyard
* Quality fixtures and fittings
* Leased until the 15/11/2020 at $360 per week
A superb package at this price - not to be missed!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised. If you prefer to view by Private Inspection please click the 'Book Inspection' button to register your preferred inspection or contact the agent to organize a suitable time. The health and safety of our clients and staff is paramount and we are closely following the advice of the Australian Government and World Health Organisation.

Description:
A fabulous family sanctuary!
A 3.5 meters high ceilings family-friendly residence, modern interior and entertainer's yard situated on a quiet street. The stylish kerbside appeal is the first thing you'll spot, thanks to the attractive façade and landscaped surrounds. As you step inside via the covered porch, you're greeted by the elegant timber-look flooring which spans the length of the entry and flows effortlessly into the open-plan family/meal zone. This bright, spacious area is made for relaxed family evenings and laid-back dining, while the adjoining contemporary kitchen is a real treat with sleek stone benchtops, huge walk-in pantry and quality stainless-steel appliances.
You'll find all four generously-sized bedrooms conveniently zoned towards the right of the property. The splendid master showcases a sizeable walk-in robe and deluxe ensuite with double vanity and huge shower.
The remaining bedrooms boast built-in robes and share the immaculate central bathroom with bathtub and separate WC. Completing this comfortable abode is a laundry with storage, ducted heating, AC to the family area and blinds/curtains throughout.
Moving outside, you'll discover an outstanding entertaining space in the form of a gorgeous decked area and a large, covered alfresco; you'll instantly imagine yourself catching up with friends here while the kids play nearby on the low-maintenance lawn. You'll also benefit from impressive eco-friendly features, including solar panels and recycled water, plus a remote double garage.
This is a home that's ideal for commuters with Officer Station, the Princes Freeway and Princes Highway just moments away. You're also close to several stunning parks, Maranatha Christian School, Officer Secondary School, Bridgewood Primary School, Eden Rise Village and Arena Shopping Centre.
Perfect for owner-occupiers and investors alike, this is the real deal. Don't miss out, call today!
Indoor Features
Dishwasher
Gas cooktop
Electric oven
Ducted heating
AC to family
Tiles/laminate/carpet
Blinds/curtains throughout
NBN connection
High ceilings
Outdoor Features
Alfresco and deck
Low-maintenance yard
Double garage
Solar panels
Recycled water

Description:
PREMIUM COURT LOCATION IN OFFICER
Positioned in a quiet enclave within the ever popular Grandvue Estate in Officer, this allotment overlooks gorgeous, rolling hills and is surrounded by an abundance of open space and parkland. Situated in a tranquil court location, which is extremely rare these days, this is the perfect spot to start your new life.
Set amongst an array of quality brand new homes, this 565m2 allotment is the ideal opportunity to build your new home.
With generous dimensions of 18m x 32.99m and minimal fall, youll be able to bring to life the house you have always dreamed of.
Titled and ready for you to build on now.
Just a short walk and youll find yourself with an array of schools at your fingertips, along with parks/playgrounds for the family, and only a short drive youll find shops, cafes, freeway access and public transport.
You certainly wont be sorry making this move. Contact us today for more information.

Description:
Effortless Living!
Reward yourself daily with this stylish and low-maintenance townhouse that is conveniently located near Lakeside Square Shopping Centre, Arena Shopping Centre, restaurants, Cardinia Road Train Station, Schools and easy freeway access.
Comprising of 3 spacious bedrooms, main with full ensuite and walk in robe, two further bedrooms and central bathroom downstairs, fully equipped kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, meals area and family room which flows through to an outdoor terrace that wraps around this level - perfect for BBQ's and entertaining all year round.
Added benefits to this home include split system cooling, electric wall heaters, dishwasher, stone bench tops, European style laundry, powder room upstairs, double remote garage with internal access and so much more!
If you are looking to get your foot into the property market, this home will not disappoint. Call today to organise your private inspection!
INSPECTION PROCEDURE:
In light of the current COVID-19 situation, this property may be inspected by appointment. We have implemented safety procedures for the wellbeing of all. These include social distancing, use of hand sanitizers and no unnecessary hand contact with surfaces within the property. Please discuss any concerns you may have before arriving at the inspection.

Description:
Contact Agent
Built with class and sophistication in mind, this family inspired residence will leave a lasting impression from the moment you enter. With the upgrades and finishes you would expect in a display home, there is so much to be admired about this fantastic property.
Elevated ceilings immediately ensures space and comfort. Stylish, low maintenance living flows effortlessly with both indoor and outdoor spaces, open plan and formal living on offer. Stacking sliding doors open from the heart of the home to an undercover alfresco zone, allowing year-round entertaining.
Living accommodation of the family meals area surrounds the chefs kitchen being the focal point of the residence featuring elegant stone benchtops, extensive drawers and cupboard space and an abundance of space in the walk in pantry. Additional theatre room is perfect for that separate living space to enjoy.
Master retreat with walk through robe complete with classy sheer blinds and impressive double vanity ensuite. Three spacious remaining bedrooms cater for the familys needs, all serviced by the main bathroom and separate powder room. All wet areas featuring stone bench tops.
Comprehensive appointments include: double glazed windows, ducted heating, split system cooling, abundance of under stairs storage and a beautiful exposed aggregate entertaining area and paths.
This home is on offer to reap the rewards of Officers premium estate. Offering a sought-after and convenient lifestyle - this on-trend home is situated moments from schools, shopping centres, popular sporting facilities, public transport and Freeway access.
Contact Ryan for more information.

Description:
The Silver Lining
Walk into Quality and Luxury with this spacious family home. Situated in the sough-after Prominence Estate in the heart of Officer.
This second to none Bevnol built home combines spectacular space, with unparalleled quality from the timber look laminate floors to the undercover outdoor area. This magnificent home boasts a very large open floor plan and consisting of 4 spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms.
The master featuring a walk-in robe and a full ensuite, all secondary bedrooms also with BIR to all bedrooms.
One of the many significant design aspects this home has to offer is an open plan kitchen designed to please the fussiest of buyers, featuring 900mm stainless steel appliances, including oven, cooktop, and rangehood. The kitchen is complete with a stone bench, a dishwasher, titled splash back, a built in pantry and loads of cupboard space.
Offering two open living zones, which comprises of a HUGE (over 13 meters long) family and dining area which adjoins to another seating/ formal lounge, all fitted with surround sound.
Other quality features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double R/C garage and MUCH MUCH MORE!
Local amenities include;
- Easy access to Princess highway & M1
- Officer Primary School
- Officer Secondary Colege
- St Brigids Catholic Primary School
- Parklands including Pioneer Way Park
- Officer Train Station
Call Khalil on 0421 711 125 to make your private viewing of this stunning family home!
*** PLEASE NOTE ***
We have obtained all information in this listing from sources that we believe to be highly reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations.

Ideal for your dream home!
This 512sqm (approx) block is situated in well-known Grandview Estate, Officer... will be sure to impress! With a frontage of 16m and a Length of 32m you should be able to fit almost anything your heart desires on this land.
It is in close proximity to most amenities including -
- St. Francis Xavier College and St Clare's Primary School,

- walking paths and parklands at your doorstep, perfect for the children to run around and play.
Call Vandana -0423 894 812 now to discuss your future homeland before it's too late.

Description:
CLASSIC CHARACTER HOME
Built by Simonds this home will impress with timeless façade and immaculate gardens. The open plan design has been executed to incorporate an abundance of natural light which flows seamlessly throughout and only two years young.
The master bedroom includes WIR and full ensuite and remaining bedrooms include built in robes and are serviced by main bathroom with separate toilet.
The kitchen is located at the heart of home and boasts stainless steel appliances, WIP and ample bench and storage space. Overlooking is the main living and dining zone which flows out to the undercover alfresco area perfect to entertain your guests all year round.
Other features include ducted heating & cooling, laundry, split system and single lock up garage.
Perfectly located in the heart of Officer and walking distance to Officer Train Station, an array of primary and secondary schools, Potters Grove Estate Park, Officers New Proposed Town Centre and much more.
With so many great features within the home, this property is sure to move quickly, so make sure to book your inspection today.

Description:
Brand New & Ready For You in Officer!
Bright and sunny in one of the best locations in Officer, this immaculately presented 3-bedroom home is a modern Officer delight!
Sitting just moments away from Officer and quality schooling, this is a perfect freestanding home for young families, downsizers or investors alike.
Stepping through the charming entry follow the stylish laminated flooring through to the open plan kitchen/meals/lounge areas. The spacious and well-appointed stone kitchen has ample cabinetry, modern stainless appliances, and bench space.
Additional features of this generous layout include gas ducted heating, single remote garage with internal access.
There are built-in wardrobes to two bedrooms, which are serviced by a central bathroom. The master bedroom has built in robe and a chic stone ensuite.
This secure 221m2 block has enough room for pets/children and includes merbau decking and artificial grass offering a low maintenance solution.
Close to shops, schools, Parks and Transport. Do not delay call to book a private inspection or attend one of our regular open for inspections.
Real estate Officer, Barry & Christine Eview Group, Officer real estate, real estate agents Officer.
